description.value:
Armor (Studded Leather), Very Rare (Requires Attunement)
This lightweight, fragrant piece is finely crafted of doeskin and reinforced with strips of woven cedar bark and rawhide. The armor is treated as +1 studded leather. In addition, while you wear it, you have advantage on any saving throws related to poison and disease, and difficult terrain doesnâ€™t impede your movement.
